onLocationChanged(android.location.Locat.Description: Called when the location has changed.

ClassDesc: Used for receiving notifications from the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#FusedLocationProviderApi_E@ when the location has changed. The methods are called if the LocationListener has been registered with the location client using the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#FusedLocationProviderApi#requestLocationUpdates_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#location#FusedLocationProviderApi#requestLocationUpdates_E@ methods.
